translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時々、ノスやらが闘神都市を落としたと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sometimes, I've heard rumors that Nos and others captured the Fighting God City.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 話題にしてたのを聞いた事がある」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've heard them talking about it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前は行かなかったのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did you not go?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サテラはそんな年じゃない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera wasn't that old.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ生まれてもいない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She hadn't even been born yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……おお、そうなのか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Oh, is that so?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昔過ぎて感覚がよく分からん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's so long ago that I can't really grasp it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「派手じゃあるが、人類にとっちゃ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was flashy, but for humanity,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワンサイドゲームだったらしいぜ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it seems it was a one-sided game.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんせ魔人を倒せる武器がない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After all, there were no weapons capable of defeating demons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお、なんだったか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, what was it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こないだの闘神もカオスを欲しがってたな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The recent Fighting God also wanted Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「闘神MM、だろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fighting God MM, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聖魔教団のボス、マジックマスター・ルーン」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The boss of the Holy Demon Cult, Magic Master Rune.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーー……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ahhh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類に裏切られて……人類を闘神やら闘将やらで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Betrayed by humanity... then attacking humanity with Fighting Gods and Fighting Generals...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻撃し始めて……で、結局暗殺された、んだっけ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He started attacking... and in the end was assassinated, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ。あたしとフリークと……もう一人と、でね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes. Me, Freak, and one other person, you see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少しだけ、ハンティは痛みを堪えるような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hanty showed a slight expression as if trying to endure pain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 表情になった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Continuation of previous line)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……全ては、そのルーンていう、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...It all started because of this superhuman called Rune.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一人の超人が世に出たせいさ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was because one superhuman appeared in the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの頃は……魔法使いは、蔑まれていてね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Back then... magicians were despised.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルーンは、その解消と…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rune sought to end that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類の恒久的な平和を本気で目指してた、らしい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was apparently serious about aiming for permanent peace for humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そこいら辺はフリーク爺さんから聞いたな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I heard about that part from old man Freak.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大層な力と志を持った……純粋な奴だったらしい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was said to be a man of great power and ideals... a pure fellow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ゼスだと、晩年におかしくなった、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In Zeth... he was treated like a mad scientist who went crazy in his later years.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マッドサイエンティストみたいな扱いだけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s how they regard him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やったことが、やったことだもんね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, considering what he did...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「タブーって訳でもないけどね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's not exactly taboo though.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むしろ、遺産は今でも活用されてるし。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rather, his legacy is still being utilized today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マナバッテリーとか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Like the mana batteries.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ただ、ゼスはその第一次魔人戦争の後、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, in Zeth, after the first Demon War,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 更にひどくなった魔法使いへの差別……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: discrimination against magicians worsened even more...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ううん、弾圧に対抗する形で建国された
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, there's also the background that it was founded in opposition to that oppression.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景もあるから、けっこう複雑なのよね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because of that background, it's quite complicated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん。どーも胡散臭いな。偽善者か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph. Somehow it sounds shady. A hypocrite?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カッカッカ。まああんたとはウマの合いそうにない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ha ha ha. Well, he probably wouldn't get along with you anyway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 男ではあったみたいだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He seemed like that kind of man.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その野郎がトチ狂ったせいで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because that guy went mad,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神やらを活用するのに苦労してるわけだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they've had trouble making use of the Fighting Gods and such.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 真面目な奴はめんどくさい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Serious people are troublesome.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その辺、大将は心配無用かね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On that matter, General, you have nothing to worry about, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カッカッカ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ha ha ha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「引き留めたければ美女を山ほど用意しておけ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you want to keep him here, prepare heaps of beautiful women.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がはははは」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんたは、おかしくなったとしても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if you go mad,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女好きのままなんだろうなあ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you'll probably still love women...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「当たり前だ。さて、そろそろ行くぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course. Now then, it's about time to go.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sometimes, I've heard rumors that Nos and others captured the Fighting God City.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 話題にしてたのを聞いた事がある」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've heard them talking about it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前は行かなかったのか？」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サテラはそんな年じゃない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera wasn't that old.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ生まれてもいない」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……おお、そうなのか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Oh, is that so?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昔過ぎて感覚がよく分からん」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんせ魔人を倒せる武器がない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After all, there were no weapons capable of defeating demons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おお、なんだったか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, what was it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こないだの闘神もカオスを欲しがってたな」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fighting God MM, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聖魔教団のボス、マジックマスター・ルーン」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The boss of the Holy Demon Cult, Magic Master Rune.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーー……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ahhh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類に裏切られて……人類を闘神やら闘将やらで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Betrayed by humanity... then attacking humanity with Fighting Gods and Fighting Generals...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 攻撃し始めて……で、結局暗殺された、んだっけ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He started attacking... and in the end was assassinated, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ。あたしとフリークと……もう一人と、でね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes. Me, Freak, and one other person, you see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少しだけ、ハンティは痛みを堪えるような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hanty showed a slight expression as if trying to endure pain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 表情になった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Continuation of previous line)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……全ては、そのルーンていう、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...It all started because of this superhuman called Rune.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一人の超人が世に出たせいさ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was because one superhuman appeared in the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの頃は……魔法使いは、蔑まれていてね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Back then... magicians were despised.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルーンは、その解消と…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rune sought to end that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類の恒久的な平和を本気で目指してた、らしい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was apparently serious about aiming for permanent peace for humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そこいら辺はフリーク爺さんから聞いたな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I heard about that part from old man Freak.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大層な力と志を持った……純粋な奴だったらしい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was said to be a man of great power and ideals... a pure fellow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ゼスだと、晩年におかしくなった、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In Zeth... he was treated like a mad scientist who went crazy in his later years.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マッドサイエンティストみたいな扱いだけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s how they regard him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やったことが、やったことだもんね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, considering what he did...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「タブーって訳でもないけどね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's not exactly taboo though.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むしろ、遺産は今でも活用されてるし。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rather, his legacy is still being utilized today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マナバッテリーとか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Like the mana batteries.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ただ、ゼスはその第一次魔人戦争の後、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, in Zeth, after the first Demon War,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 更にひどくなった魔法使いへの差別……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: discrimination against magicians worsened even more...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ううん、弾圧に対抗する形で建国された
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, there's also the background that it was founded in opposition to that oppression.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景もあるから、けっこう複雑なのよね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because of that background, it's quite complicated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん。どーも胡散臭いな。偽善者か」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph. Somehow it sounds shady. A hypocrite?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カッカッカ。まああんたとはウマの合いそうにない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ha ha ha. Well, he probably wouldn't get along with you anyway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 男ではあったみたいだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He seemed like that kind of man.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その野郎がトチ狂ったせいで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because that guy went mad,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闘神やらを活用するのに苦労してるわけだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they've had trouble making use of the Fighting Gods and such.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 真面目な奴はめんどくさい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Serious people are troublesome.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その辺、大将は心配無用かね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On that matter, General, you have nothing to worry about, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カッカッカ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ha ha ha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「引き留めたければ美女を山ほど用意しておけ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you want to keep him here, prepare heaps of beautiful women.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がはははは」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gahahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんたは、おかしくなったとしても
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if you go mad,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女好きのままなんだろうなあ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you'll probably still love women...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「当たり前だ。さて、そろそろ行くぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course. Now then, it's about time to go.
